name: Interface Reporter
text: This interface provides error, warning and notice reporting.

methods.description: Print error message and increment error count.

methods.method_sig:
void print (Diagnostic.Kind kind,
           DocTreePath path,
           String msg)
methods.description: Print an error message and increment error count.

methods.method_sig:
void print (Diagnostic.Kind kind,
           Element e,
           String msg)
methods.description: Print an error message and increment error count.
